sentences.en: Can you pick out the operatic arias quoted in this orchestral passage?
sentences.cn: 你能听出这段管弦乐曲里有歌剧式的咏叹调 吗 ?

sentences.en: Characteristic is Berlioz's frequent use of the orchestral crescendo.
sentences.cn: 柏辽兹连续地使用乐队渐强,这是很有特点的.

sentences.en: Glen Bronka wrote his own orchestral arrangements.
sentences.cn: 格伦·布朗卡把自己的曲子改编成了管弦乐曲。

sentences.en: His tone poems are a treasury of orchestral discoveries.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐诗是管弦乐作品的宝库.

sentences.en: History suggests orchestral diplomacy may be of little real relevance.
sentences.cn: 历史表明交响外交能起到的作用可能微乎其微.

sentences.en: I don't like orchestral concerts - discos are more my scene.
sentences.cn: 我对管弦乐音乐会不感兴趣 —— 我喜欢跳迪斯科舞.

sentences.en: I had written quite a lot of orchestral music in my student days.
sentences.cn: 我在学生时代创作过很多管弦乐作品。

sentences.en: I have a special liking for orchestral music.
My sister is going to accompany her friends to the orchestral music concert tomorrow night.
sentences.cn: 姐姐明天晚上要陪朋友去听管弦乐音乐会.

sentences.en: Nora: I have a special liking orchestral music.
sentences.cn: 诺拉: 我特别喜欢管弦乐.

sentences.en: The orchestral accompaniment adds to this effect by interrupting its hurried pulse for a moment.
sentences.cn: 交响乐团伴奏会片刻穿插进它匆忙的节奏以加强舞曲效果.
这个管弦乐团的演奏棒极了。

sentences.en: There was everything from simple piano to a full orchestral finish. The full monty.
sentences.cn: 从单音的钢琴演奏到最后的管弦乐队齐奏，什么都有了。真是一应俱全。

sentences.en: This piece of orchestral music is write by Wagner.
sentences.cn: 这支管弦乐曲是瓦格纳写成的.

sentences.en: This piece of orchestral music was written by Wagner.
sentences.cn: 这支管弦乐曲是由瓦格纳写成的.

words.tran_cn: 管弦乐编曲；和谐的结合
管弦乐演奏家；管弦乐编曲家
把…编成管弦乐曲；（美）精心安排；把…协调地结合起来

trans.tran_cn: 管弦乐队（演奏）的，为管弦乐队演奏的，管弦乐队的
trans.tran_en: relating to or written for an orchestra
